title: Canna Bali Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Relax at Canna Bali with its beachfront pool, ocean views, and vibrant beach club scene.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the beachfront pool and club facilities.
Sip cocktails while watching the sunset over the ocean.

title: Canna Bali Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside lounging, food, and sunset cocktails at Canna Bali.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the beachfront pool, club amenities, and ocean views.
Lunch with a view of the ocean.
Relax by the pool, enjoy club amenities, or stroll the beach.
Sip cocktails while watching the sunset over the ocean.
